{
  "name": "graphql-api",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "API GraphQL avec Gqlgen, authentification JWT et d√©ploiement sur Kubernetes",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "go build -o ./graphql-api main.go",
    "start": "go run main.go",
    "test": "go test ./...",
    "lint": "golint ./...",
    "run": "docker-compose up --build"
  },
  "dependencies": {

    "gqlgen": "^0",

  },

  },
